author: Special Correspondent
text:
The drive for updating the National Population Register (NPR) will begin in the city on Monday.

Enumerators, mostly Corporation workers led by officials of the Civil Supplies and Consumer Protection Department, will visit houses in all neighbourhoods to collect information about ration card, Aadhaar and mobile phone numbers of residents.

Chennai Corporation Commissioner Vikram Kapur will be the district registrar for the exercise. The drive will continue till February 5.

— Special Correspondent
title: NPR drive to begin on Monday
